dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
J. Zhao
Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: The AG News dataset consists of news articles across four categories: World, Sports, Business, and Science/Technology. It is commonly used as a benchmark for evaluating the performance of text classification models.
dcterms:title: AG News

dcterms:creator: E. F. Tjong Kim Sang
F. De Meulder
dcterms:description: The CoNLL-2003 dataset is a widely-used benchmark for evaluating named entity recognition systems. It contains annotations for four entity types: Person, Organization, Location, and Miscellaneous, derived from news articles.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2003
